content.detailedDescription: I hadn't thought to report it but about a week after i had acquired a new prescription for glasses--so, my eyes were still adjusting--i let my dog outside to go potty when something caught my eyes: i am unsure what it was only that it had to have had a structure because there were stationary lights that seemed to be either pulsing, or there was some movement to it.  what was so unusually to me is that, considering how close it was to me (i have half a block from the edge of town) and how low it was flying (just above homes and tree tops), that there was no sound!  it wasn't moving extraordinarily fast, but it was moving faster (almost "gliding" if you will) than a helicopter and a plane would have been capable.  but, what plane or helicopter would travel so low, or so late at night with nothing to light their path?  it traveled to fast and was obscured by other buildings in town and other trees that i could not grad my camera in the hopes of capturing any evidence of what i saw.
content.summary: Low-flying/ silent ufo

content.detailedDescription:
I took the initial picture because my neighbor had been talking about hearing a hum come and leave the past two nights. it was very very bright and all white and it looked much closer and larger than any of the other faint stars in the area which my camera did not pick up due to trailer and city light pollution. after enlarging and zooming in on the subject taken with a 12mp kodak easyshare camera, i discovered it looked insanely abnormal.

after a while it went further below the local trees, much faster than the orbit and rotation of the planet earth and the milky way aught to have allowed it.
content.summary: Looks like a figure eight almost

content.detailedDescription: I picked a buddy up from his house and coming out of his neighborhood is a field, i delayed seeing an orange glowing object in the sky above the field but far enough to not be able to distinguish thorough details but did see what looked like peter pans hat sideways without a feather and orange glowing almost from within of a rich orangish red, after slowing down to an eventual complete stop i proceeded to ask my buddy if what we were looking at is a ufo to which he numerously replied 'i don't know'. after a few short minutes the object appeared to get smaller and smaller and disappear within about 4 seconds, either that or some cloaking device was used and the glow ceased from the outside inward and we could not see it. hope there's more out there, know disclosure is around the corner
content.summary: Orange glowing triangular craft

content.detailedDescription: Up close and personal, very alert to the camera, oval with a magnetic field around it, olympus e-510, 14 mm, f 5.6, 1/640 speed, no sound.Clear day, photo number p622-3618, hickory airport, burke co. nc
content.summary: In face, dark disc, magnetic power field, close to runway 24, hky airport, burke co. nc

content.detailedDescription: Object appeared stationary, white exterior body with magnetic power field above, two dark lens, 4 feet in diameter, no sound, appeared aware of the camera. olympus e-510, 14 mm, f 5.6, 1/640 second.Residential community,photo p525-4806, caldwell county nc.
content.summary: Oval shape, white exterior with power field above, twin dark lens, 4 ft in diameter

content.detailedDescription: Appeared stationary, oval or wide white body, a darker area appeared to have two circular lens facing toward me. what appeared to be a magnetic power field above it. estimated width around 4 feet. no sound. olympus e-510, 32 mm, f 5.6, 1/640 exposure. clear weather with no airplanes. photo number p525-4800 date: 05-25-2013
content.summary: Oval shape with twin dark center, white outside body, power field,no sound or lights, 4 ft wide

content.detailedDescription:
I submitted this report on 7 may 2015 to the national ufo reporting center at the behest of mr. peter davenport. per mr. davenport, there was an independent report of ostensibly the same object filed from maryland the same day. at the behest of mr. tom deuley, i am reporting it here, too.

on 7 may 2015 at about 8 p.M. edt, while sitting on my patio i noticed what appeared to be a particularly bright star practically at zenith. at first i suspected it was venus, but the object didn't act like a star. i had my wife keep eyes on the object while i retrieved two sets of binoculars, and we both observed the object. the object appeared to resolve as a tiny disk vice a point, so i had my wife continue to observe it while i retrieved my camera. when i returned, she reported that a tiny object appeared to swiftly go by the larger object, while the larger object appeared to remain stationary. i photographed it through a 250mm lens, and the image showed a round bright white object connected to a tiny object by a thin line.

next, i retrieved my 750mm telescope. my wife reported the object slowly creeping east southeast. its speed made it difficult to keep up with on the telescope's equatorial mount, and its speed seemed to increase toward the ese. when i finally got it in view, i observed it through a 7.5mm eyepiece, and it resolved into what appeared to be a white sphere connected to a small object via a dangling cable. the sphere was about 2 times the size of jupiter through the same eyepiece. the slow speed of the oscillation (>1 second) of the dangling object implied a relatively long line, and the oscillation would occasionally tip the sphere and expose an orange object at the interface between the line and the sphere. my wife, eldest son and i observed for a few minutes.

at this point, i recalled the successful bombing of the mainland u.S. by the japanese in world war ii via hydrogen balloons, so i looked online for where to report this ostensible balloon. i quickly came across the national ufo reporting center, so i called them at 8:17 p.M. it was about when i called when the object faded out of view. the center operator requested i write this report, and suggested i call local law enforcement if i was truly concerned. i contacted fairfax county police, and they said they couldn't take action if the object were as high as it appeared (whereas they could respond for an aerial object threatening people on the ground, e.G., a rogue quad-copter).

as i was compiling my data for the report, my wife came across a local news channel interview online with the national weather service about their radiosonde balloons. the balloons in the video looked much like the object we observed, so i called the ufo reporting center back. the operator suggested i do a winds aloft check to verify the direction of the object. the local airport at dulles didn't have an available report online, but the richmond, va, and westminster, md, airports did. the winds aloft report from westminster indicated that the balloon probably originated there: for the object to be stationary and then drift east meant that it passed between 18000 and 30000 feet. moreover, the winds from the surface to 18000 feet would have taken the balloon south and then west, which is where it was relative to westminster.

attached are a 3x zoom of a crop of one of my photos at two contrast levels, a sketch of the view of the object through my 750mm telescope with a 7.5mm eyepiece, a screen grab of the winds aloft report from westminster, md for 7 may, and a picture i found online that seemed consistent with what i observed through the telescope.
content.summary: Observation of a probable weather balloon in busy greater dc metro airspace.

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking the dogs out about 3:45 am on 5/11/2015.  when i opened my front door i noticed a red light and a blue light that seemed like it was under my neighbor window, i thought someone was breaking in.  suddenly there were 2 round circles of swirling, primary color, lights. one stayed lower to the ground but not on the ground.  the other looked the same but playfully kept going around the bottom circle in a oval path.  at one point the upper circle flew down and into the lower circle and then flew back into the air and continued to move around the lower circle.  
neither dog noticed right away because there was no sound.  when the dogs finally noticed them they growled and started barking.  the circles did not change. i went inside to wake my husband, i did not want to be the only one to see this amazing event. him and i watched out the window for a minute and then we no longer could see them.  no pictures were taken, i was so fascinated i did not even think about taking a picture, maybe next time.  what a wonderful world.
content.summary: Very early in morning, i got up to take dogs out.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving around my neighborhood about 7:15pm,it was a clear night and visibility was great.As i was driving i saw what seemed to be 2 bright lights about a quarter of a mile away above the tree tops.I drove towards the object trying to get a better vantage point to try and identify what it was.Fortunately my neighborhood has many roads running through it and i was able to get very close.As i got within 500ft i got the scare of my life, it was a saucer shaped craft that was about 70-80ft in diameter hovering 100ft over a house.It had 2 bright lights on each side of the disk and many multicolored lights between none of them were blinking.I rolled down the window to listen,but it did not make any sound at all.I had slowed down to about 5mph when the craft,which had been hovering on a horizontal axis,slowly turned onto a vertical axis and very slowly moved off towards the southwest.As it moved off i noticed what looked to be a very weak bluish light emitting from what previously was the top and bottom of the saucer when it was hovering horizontally.I can only guess that the color of the craft was gunmetal gray or black, since it was dark and the lights on it were bright but they were not illuminating it like i would have expected them to.After it had moved over the treeline i did not see it again. it was a life changing event, never had something had such an impact on me.
content.summary: Classic saucer shaped craft observed at close range above a house in my former neighborhood.

content.detailedDescription: Disc appeared to be around 6 ft. in diameter. traveled approximately 800 feet in 1/1000 of a second. dark in color, no sound or trail,14 mm lens.Photo number p516-3523, [location removed]
content.summary: Very fast, dark dome disc,no sound or trail, olympus e-510, f 4.5, shutter 1/1000

content.detailedDescription: I watched what i thought was an aircraft but there was no sound, no vapor trail . it rotated then went behind some trees and i did not see it again. it had disappeared.
content.summary: I saw something that i thought was an aircraft but it was not .

content.detailedDescription:
sitting in garden
seen object shine
thought it was a foil balloon got 8x32 zeiss binoculars
1st object main 1    3 circles making a triangle
2nd objects 5      just like  white dots
3rd object 1      slightly rectangle white round corners

never thought i would see the day
thought it was worth reporting   love to no what they were
the 1st main object one only were like three round
 silver balloons joined together in the shape of a triangle it was reflecting the sun as the sun was setting in the west.The object was spinning about 10-11 rpm i thought if this was due to the wind then the object should of moved alot-lot quicker across the sky unless it was very high which it was ,  then  asks the question how big was it.The sighting is only about 10 miles aprox from birmingham airport.The night of the sighting no ground wind.


as i was taking the binoculars to and from my eyes others disappeared ?
only the one main object was left and that came to be covered by a 
highesh sort of thinish blanket cloud.
content.summary: 7 objects seen through binoculars

content.detailedDescription: One late fall night 1965 or 66 i was out with my low powered on my back lawn.After chasing a few needing eye relief i leaned back and right over my head was a triangle or boomerang strait over head going slow. the back of the craft looked molten and was giving off sparks and the thing that brought it back to mind was seeing the english air bases that were american where 100 servicemen witness it. the drawings could have been twins was going west all the while and lost sight after 4 minutes. astonishment and awe this was the time that a wave of unexplained lights and sightings took place.
content.summary: Out  with a small powered telescope we were chasing moving lights in the sky. when eyes got tired backed away and looked strait up and there it was

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were on the back deck at about 10:30 with two other friends when my wife said "what is that?!". i turned to look where she was pointing and saw 4 blue lights in a line that flashed quickly in sequence and then turned green and flashed, alternating between blue and green as it continued to flash, travelling from east to west in the northern sky at a fair rate of speed. it appeared to be about an inch long from "first light to last light". it disappeared behind the rooftop of our neighbour's garage so i ran out front and observed it travelling sw until it disappeared behind the roofs of the houses. approximately 20-30 minutes later one of our friends and i were still on the deck (my wife and his girlfriend were in the kitchen at this time)and we saw it return on the same flight path but appeared to be closer this time. i could see the dark outline shaped like a "slightly flattened rugby ball". the lights were still rapidly flashing in succession and changing on each "flash cycle" from blue to green. my friend and i both saw it the second time, and he said "do you see that?!" i said "ya, i see that". he said "what is that?", i said "i have no idea". the object then appeared to hover slightly in the sky (i believe this is because it changed direction and pointed north, so the object appeared to "pause" in the sky as its trajectory changed) and a red light flashed quickly once, and very brightly from the same area the blue-to-green lights were flashing, then three red-orange squares in a line immediately lit up very bright (they did not "flare up", but were immediately very bright and very square) and we could see from the lights the illuminated (back?) of the craft. from the light of the red squares, you could see that they were aligned on a definite object of some kind, and the craft was textured in an apparent "mechanical" surface. the object then shot off at an incredible rate as the red squares went dark again. we watched the continuing blue to green lights that were flashing this entire time until it vanished in the distance. it took about 2 seconds for it to disappear (we watched it until it became so small we could no longer see it. we time planes that leave the airport (though the angle of the object's trajectory in the sky was a little different), and it took approx. 10 minutes for the planes to disappear from view, much, much slower than the object we witnessed.

the first sighting lasted almost two seconds as it passed over, and another 3-4 seconds as i watched it from the front until it disappeared over the roofs. the second sighting lasted 8-10 seconds, and was noticeably closer than when we had seen it the first time. if you hold an outstretched arm and spread your thumb and index finger, it was about two inches from "thumb to finger" long (side to side), and about 3/4 of an inch wide (top to bottom) during the second sighting. i would estimate it to have been no more than a few kilometers away. it was very distinct and very visible. we did not have to "try" and see what it was, just to try and figure out what we were seeing.

the first time the object was seen, there was the sound of a plane heard (we live in coventry in calgary and so are close to the airport and flight paths), but once the object had moved across the sky the first time, we then saw the plane in the east as it left from the airport. the object itself made no noise. we see planes leaving the airport and on landing approach all the time and are very familiar with the flight paths. the object did not follow any typical flight path at any time. the second sighting of the (assumed) same object there was no sound in the sky and no planes seen or heard. the object made no noise whatsoever. it was completely silent.
content.summary: Saw 4 lights in the sky that were colectively changing from blue to green and flashing quickly in order. lights maintained close horizonal linar position (seemed to be on the same object) and watched it move across the sky from our back deck.

content.detailedDescription: As we were traveling, i noticed a very bright light in the sky, i watched it steadily for 20 minutes or so before recording.  we recorded for a few moments and i also viewed the light while we pulled over on the side of the road through binoculars, not sure how powerful they were, but i was able to see a triangular shape that appeared to spin, and alternate colors between red, green and blue.  the lights of the city of raton are visible at the bottom of the frame, and provided a reference point while i was watching.  the light did not appear to move at all, as we got closer the color changes were then visible.  we saw the light until we made a right-hand turn onto i-25 going north through raton pass.  as we were traveling through the pass, the light seemed to fade behind cloud cover.  another thing worth mentioning is that while viewing the object through binoculars, i could see the light reflecting off of near by small clouds in the immediate vicinity of the object.
content.summary: Traveling hwy 87 observed stationary light in sky, directly above raton nm, observed 20 minutes, then stopped and observed with binoculars and recorded on phone

content.detailedDescription: I was not trying to photograph anything in particular,the ring around the sun made me curious so i started snapping pictures with my cell phone without looking because i was shieding my eyes from the glare of the sun.The sun was at the top of the sky so it must have been 12oclock noon.I did not see the photo till days later,and i have curiosity to know what it is you can see in one of the photos where object is closing in towards the ring.
content.summary: Red circle

content.detailedDescription: 3 craft which i first thought were birds or aircraft due to their shape.  they were reflective in the center and appeared to have a reddish/darker color where "wings" would be.  they made no sound and as i observed them they changed formation and direction once or twice before appearing to increase elevation until they were no longer visible.  i live right next to buckley air force base and i am familiar with normal aircraft. these objects made no sound and either cloaked or ascended put of the atmosphere. due to their behavior and odd flight i felt this needed to be reported.
content.summary: 3 unidentified craft flew over head while ascending and dissappear from view

content.detailedDescription:
1. walking my dog
2.The light coming from the object, as well as the close proximity
3. i was honestly just stunned when i saw the object, it was unlike anything i had ever seen! i spent a short amount of time in the marine corps and was going in to aviation, this was like nothing i've seen, ever!
4.,it's not as fresh in my mind as it was, the only thing i have to go off of other then memory is a short notepad entry in my phone that i wrote immediately after. word for word this is what i wrote.... "saw ufo tonight november 29th was silent and very fast, best way to explain what it looked like was a light bulb looking fuse was a bit before ten pm white and blue lights literally saw for two seconds and it completely disappeared "
5. i was just stunned, even while it was happening, i didn't even think twice about pulling my phone out, all i could do was look because it was so odd looking. in fact i even recall remembering how clear the actual windows of the object was. it now thinking back, almost reminds me of a version of a blimp but not really, it was just shaped like one.
6. the object was moving very fast, yet just slow enough i got a good look at it.
content.summary: Was walking dog when i saw the object

content.detailedDescription: At 4:10 am on the way home from work driving south on wayne rd near joy rd saw 2 bright lights in the east that looked more like the size of headlights,instead of plane lights,it had a red flashing light also.It was moving slow and not that high in the sky.Turned into my subdivision. as it came more directly overhead i got goose bumps and my hair stood up on my arms as it came over the tree line it was a triangle with 4 bright white lights on each side and a red flashing light in the middle.The white lights looked like they were headlight size,lost sight of it in the tree line as it traveled to the southwest. it just was not moving as fast as a plane would.Looked back to the east and  saw there was a small plane moving to the east. just wonder if anyone else saw this?
content.summary: 2 white lights like head lights moving slow then when overhead triangle shape w/red flashing light in middle

content.detailedDescription:
Folks, i have reported this observation before. i am refilling it now as i have recently found a photo on the internet that more closely, by a little, the craft that passed over my head. i was on my way to work early on a sunday morning about 15 miles south of sioux falls where i live when i noticed a large craft come into view straight to the west of the road i was taking. i formed the immediate opinion that if it was an airliner it wouldn't make it to sioux falls regional airport, as is seemed so low. i was approaching a low spot in the road where a creek crosses and i got stopped and the craft continued straight to the east. i had time to get my coffee mug and stand outside for a few seconds before the craft passed overhead just slightly south of being directly over my head. as i reported earlier. there were warm red lights. brighter on each of the three points of the triangle and four other warm red lights of lesser intensity. one forward on one side, and one rearward on the other side. there were two warm red lights toward one side along the rear line of the craft. i recently found this picture of a similar craft reading a story on the net.
in the center or belly of the craft was a circular portion which was visible to the eye but was not alight as i observed. the whole event took perhaps 2-3 minutes from beginning to end to conclude. i got in my truck and went to work. later, at work i did tell two people what i saw. they didn't believe me, so i dropped it until a couple years later when another person i worked with encouraged me to file a report. i was contacted by the south dakota director, and am filing this again to perhaps email him this photo and ask him more about these triangle shaped craft that are seen all over our country and the world. thanks for taking the time to read this. i am doing this entry on a work computer. if the state director can email me again, i will pull the pic off my home computer which is where it must be. thanks a lot.
content.summary: Very large triangle shaped craft flew west to east over my place on road. i had time to exit truck and observe

content.detailedDescription: I was going home then my friend and i saw a big blue light fly sporadically then fly close to the ground then back up and it disappeared all within seconds. my friend and i felt heavy in our heart chakras and we're tingly for another hour.
content.summary: Bright light object jumping around then sped to the ground then flew away in seconds

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside with my usual cup of coffee at 0545 local time looking up at the early morning sky , i note the stars,moon etc. and slightly west of the moon appeared at first to be an aircraft flying north to south at what appeared to be the pace usually observed for satelites, this was too big for a satellite and it was only seen for about 20 seconds and made no noise , i live on the flight path for aircraft approach to johannesburg or tambo airport and i know the rate aircraft operate height and speed, also i am an ex pilot this was different and where lights would be on an aircraft nav, etc there were only white lights.  i have never seen anything like this before and i am an aviation enthusiast and know aircraft
like a satellite it faded out of sight, this was larger than any satellite ai had seen before and would be about the size of a b777 at about 20000ft but at that height no noise!!! unusual
content.summary: Like a high flying airliner at night with white lights on wing tips, unusual for an aircraft  no noise

content.detailedDescription:
I was in [removed location] coming back from dropping a friend off. 
i was looking at the road while driving on  [removed location] when i happened to glance to my right out at the night sky.
at first i thought i was seeing things and then i focused and thought it was some kind of plane flying by. except it was gliding or floating more like. it floated across the sky and then hover in a spot for a few seconds. then it went over a tree line as i followed it in my car down a street i turned onto. i was in shock and disbelief . it felt creepy watching it. like you know its something very foreign.

saw an extremely large black triangular craft float through the night sky then hover. it had white exterior lights and a red blinking one. seen around 1040pm  eastern standard
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I saw an extremely large black triangular craft float through the night sky then hover. it had white exterior lights and a red blinking one. seen around 1040pm  eastern standard .

content.detailedDescription:
In 1998 i was living in wangaratta victoria when i noticed two orange coloured lights out of my window, i thought they may have been helicopters because it was still daylight, but as they got closer i noticed that there was no structure just two spheres . at this stage me and my brother both ran out side to get a closer look, once we had got outside they were hovering above the house the size of earth balls and the colour of the sun, well it was more like dancing similar to how jelly fish look  like underwater, these things appeared to be observing me and my brother, they started to get lower as they did i felt anxious, the only way i can describe it is that i felt like these things were beings of pure energy.
 so i decided i did not want to be that close as i started to move to go under carport , they also decided they had seen enough they started to spiral and got faster both of them started to take of following the path of the road , i was still under carport, but my brother chased the spheres down the road.
i did scream at him to come back and then the most strange thing is they didn't simply take to the skies, but vanished into thin air, as if they were never there. i felt like we had just been given a glimpse of something that is always there but usually unseen, i know that sounds stupid but they were not random, they were aware of me and my brother and its weird having something watching you that doesn't have eyes.
it has affected me in a very profound way, because seeing something like this first hand changes your whole ideology on life as we know it.
the attached artwork is a painting i did not long after the event, however the tails were added for effect.
content.summary: Two  huge spheres that looked like fire hovered over the top of my house.

content.detailedDescription: went to a clear feild in glidden iowa.From the sout came an almost diamond shaped craft with vertical red striped flashing light and yellow on top lande to my south just to my left less than 20ft. from me.Suddenly from the east came a hexagon shaped craft with white almond shaped light to right of what appeared to be a door.The hexagon shaped craft projected a beam of light on me and suddenly when i looked at the other craft i stopped being drawn toward like a moth to a flame. the diamond shaped craft gave me a very,very sickening feeling like the beam of light from the hexagon shaped craft gave me the feeling to avoid the diamond shaped craft almost like the diamond shaped craft had horrible if not evil intentions thats all i rember except walking away from the feild.
content.summary: Two craft one hexagonal with white almond light by door one almost diamond

content.detailedDescription: I was at my brothers house along with my wife and sister in law. my brother and i were having a few drinks not our wives. my sister in law first noticed the objects coming from the south over the trees about 2:05 or 2:10 am. we quickly ran to the driveway and started looking towards the objects. i asked if anyone was recording this event and no one was. so i quickly ran back and got my phone and started recording. we noticed two fireball looking like objects and i quickly assumed that they were lanterns, but then there were 4 more in like a diagonal square like formation. then 2 more came and then one last one i ran down the street to see if i can see it close up but i couldn't see clearly then the lights or fireball went out i saw white object t go up.
content.summary: 9 objects total no sound flying from south to north in formation like pattern.  excuse our language in the video.

content.detailedDescription: I had just woke up and had to use the bathroom at 2:30am. the bedroom window was open and the moon must have been out because i could see the yard in the light. i got a drink from the kitchen of some crystal light and got back in bed. my husband had woke too and asked me can you sleep? i said i feel awake now so i think i will get on my ipad. just then i noticed a bright flash of light in the bedroom that was white. i looked out the window and saw 7 red blinking orb lights in a row horizontally and they blinked randomly. they were positioned under a neighbors tree in the yard. there where no cars going up and down the road. if a car comes around normally i know what that looks like from living here for 18 years. the lights where visible for only 5 seconds and they didn't move like headlights. they looked suspended in the yard about 4 feet off the ground. they where about the size of a quarter from the distance of 40 feet.  my husband saw the flash of white light also but he didn't see the red orbs blinking. my first reaction was that was weird. i even said it to my husband. when i first noticed it i thought am i seeing police lights? but i looked where i saw the lights and they where too low to be where lights on a car would be on a police car. no cars where driving around. just the porch light was on on the next street from a house across the way. the lights did not actually move they where stationary after blinking randomly they just dissapeared.
content.summary: Saw blinking red lights in yard across from us under a tree all in a row about 7 of them.

content.detailedDescription:
It looked like two small red lights that had nothing flashing whatsoever, no other light colors: just two red dots that steadily moved s sw.. followed by a third red light that had a more commercial looking flashing red light attached to it.  i did hear a single motor sound about 30 seconds after appearance, sounding like a helicopter with a jet engine (the kind the police use, aka "foxtrot" in baltimore city). 
the lights became obstructed by my house roof, and as i walked to the other side of the house to observe the lights in continuity, only one red light remained- the flashing one, which now had added a flashing white light. the two original red lights were not to be seen (i do have trees in the area so they could of been obscured)

what made this interesting is that that first two lights were red with no landing/commercial lights. i live near a small airport, and national guard base, and am used to aircraft… but not aircraft with no blinking lights nor noise being trailed by a third aircraft with noise!
content.summary: 3 red lights total: 2 unwavering, no flashing lights, followed by 3rd flashing light

content.detailedDescription:
This sighting took place in may of 1975 in the desert of utah, at night, right off a highway while traveling towards colorado. to this day it was been a scary and unexplained event in my life. 

i saw a full side view of a very huge bright lit multi-colored (mostly variations of blues, as i remember) circular in shape tunnel looking (vortex) like thing, swirling over the flat desert floor.  it appeared to be several miles long (tube shape), extremely tall in height and just a couple miles off the highway i was traveling on.  i'd just like to know if anyone else has ever seen something similar, and if so, what could it be? do you have any ideas? it's bugged me all of  this years and has made me fearful of dark deserts ever since.

any help would greatly be appreciated.
content.summary: Desert of utah may 1975, i saw a huge blueish spirling miles long vortex tunnel thing. i'm curious, what was it?

content.detailedDescription:
Como 100 pequeñas esferas unidas, bastante grande, no podemos calcular el numero pero eran muchas, abriendose y cerrandose, formaba figuras, la mas frecuente un 8 o simbolo de infinito, no traia luces pero brillaba, color plateado con gris y blanco cuando se abria, se detuvo arriba de nosotros, cambio de forma varias veces y continuo hacia el sur, brilló intenso y desaparecio metros adelante

estabamos en el techo de la casa, como todas las noches, esperando que pasaran,  salen del cielo algunas veces, o sea que vienen invisibles pero lo dejan al llegar a nosotros, nos apago la camara y el celular, se escuchaban sonidos porque estaba muy bajo, siempre lo hacen.  el sonido es como un bzzzz  y a veces es como un crujido metalico muy tenue

esta nave nunca la habiamos visto antes, es nueva para nosotros, eramos 3 personas en ese momento, por lo regular somos 5, ninguno de nosotros nos pudimos mover y la energia nos erizo la piel y el cabello, tampoco eso nos habia pasado antes

como media hora despues una esferita regreso, sola, del tamaño de una pelota de softball, sin luces, de color plateado, estabamos acostados en el techo, paso tan cerca, sin escudo, que si hubieramos estado parados lo podemos tocar.  dio una vuelta sobre nosotros y desaparecio en una de las esquinas del techo

cabe mencionar que en esta area no hay espacio aereo, no pasan aviones comerciales, solo tienen permitido navegar helicopteros y avionetas, y no pasan frecuente.  no tenemos chemtrails
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Aprox. 100 pequeñas esferas, abriendose y cerrandose, formaba figuras, la mas frecuente un 8 o simbolo de infinito, no traia luces pero brillaba, se detuvo arriba de nosotros, cambio de forma varias veces y continuo
